name: The Colour Artificer
description:
Take the mantle as the Colour Artificer, a professional colour craftsman, in the city of Ocallaghan! Play as Hugh Krom, the son of the first Colour Artificer,  and make a variety of colours for any customer that come to your store. Listen to their tales, learn from what their heart wishes, and make it reality. Colour the world you wish to live in!

Meet the team who worked on this game!

Justin Acosta - Creative Director, Designer/Writer, Artist, Programmer

Nikki Calimlim - Project Manager, Designer/Editor

Sam Arpon - Artist

Gillian Cornwall - Artist

Brandon Hernandez - Programmer
